## assistive-webdriver package

This package contains functions to be used with selenium-webdriver in order to test a web application with a screen reader.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addScreenReaderTextListener(webdriver, fn, scope)](./assistive-webdriver.addscreenreadertextlistener.md) | Registers a listener function to be called each time a new message is coming from the screen reader. |
|  [clearCachedScreenReaderText(webdriver)](./assistive-webdriver.clearcachedscreenreadertext.md) | Clears any locally cached screen reader text for the given instance of selenium-webdriver. |
|  [forScreenReaderToSay(expectedText, clean)](./assistive-webdriver.forscreenreadertosay.md) | Returns a selenium-webdriver [Condition object](https://www.selenium.dev/selenium/docs/api/javascript/module/selenium-webdriver/index_exports_Condition.html) usable with [the wait method](https://www.selenium.dev/selenium/docs/api/javascript/module/selenium-webdriver/index_exports_WebDriver.html#wait) of selenium-webdriver. |
|  [isMatch(screenReaderText, expectedText)](./assistive-webdriver.ismatch.md) | Returns whether the text coming from the screen reader passed as the first parameter matches the expected text specified as the second parameter. |
|  [refreshScreenReaderText(webdriver)](./assistive-webdriver.refreshscreenreadertext.md) | Calls the assistive-webdriver server to get any new text coming from the screen reader, and, if there is any, synchronously calls listeners registered with [addScreenReaderTextListener()](./assistive-webdriver.addscreenreadertextlistener.md)<!-- -->. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SCREEN\_READER\_TEXT\_COMMAND](./assistive-webdriver.screen_reader_text_command.md) | Name of the command registered in selenium-webdriver to get the text from the screen reader. |
|  [SCREEN\_READER\_TEXT\_METHOD](./assistive-webdriver.screen_reader_text_method.md) | HTTP method used on the assistive-webdriver server to get the text from the screen reader. |
|  [SCREEN\_READER\_TEXT\_PATH](./assistive-webdriver.screen_reader_text_path.md) | HTTP path used on the assistive-webdriver server to get the text from the screen reader. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [WebdriverLike](./assistive-webdriver.webdriverlike.md) | Direct reference to a selenium-webdriver [WebDriver](https://www.selenium.dev/selenium/docs/api/javascript/module/selenium-webdriver/index_exports_WebDriver.html) instance, or to an object containing a WebDriver instance as its <code>driver</code> property. |
